sentences.sContent: Maggie felt a muscle spasm in her back.
sentences.sCn: 玛吉觉得背部肌肉一阵抽搐。

sentences.sContent: Tom’s jaw muscles had gone into spasm .
sentences.sCn: 汤姆的颌部肌肉开始抽搐。

words.tran: 痉挛的，痉挛性的；间歇性的
断续性地；发作性地；痉挛性地
强直状态，[临床] 痉挛状态

trans.tranCn: 痉挛； 抽搐； 突发， 阵发
trans.tranOther: an occasion when your muscles suddenly become tight, causing you pain
